card.name: Accurate Intelligence
card.property:
+1 initiative
Choose one of your 'Mechs. That 'Mech gets +1 attack.

card.name: Aerospace Fighter Mission
card.property:
Scrap Aerospace Fighter Mission when it is revealed.
Deal 5 damage divided any way you choose among any number of 'Mechs and/or sites.

card.name: Alex Mallory
card.property: {T}: Look at opponent's hand and choose a card. Opponent restocks that card and draws a card. Use this ability only during your Missions phase but not during a mission. Scrap Alex Mallory to roll a die: 1-6, gain +(1-6) resources. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. • Deputy Secretary Federated Commonwealth Ministry of Intelligence

card.name: Ambush!
card.property:
Scrap Ambush! when it is revealed.
You may activate Ambush! when opponent attacks.
Deal 1 damage to each attacking 'Mech for each 1 construction above the cost of Ambush! Use this effect only during a mission.

card.name: Ammo Explosion
Arms Reduction
Arrow IV Battery
card.property: {T}: Deal 1 structure damage to one site. Use this ability only during your Missions phase but not during a mission.

card.name: Assassin (ASN-21)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The uncommon <i>Assassin</i> is coveted for its prodigious jump capability.</i>

card.name: Atlas (AS7-D)
Atlas (AS7-K)
card.property: Missile 1 Overheat 4: +4 attack Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes Atlas deals -1 damage.)

card.name: Awesome (AWS-8Q)
card.property:
If the <i>Awesome</i> attacks and is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.
<i>The<i> Awesome</i>'s massive armament has earned it a fierce reputation</i>

card.name: Awesome (AWS-9M)
card.property: Overheat 2: +2 attack <i>Many consider the AWS-9M upgrade inferior to the original ''Awesome'</i>

card.name: Axman (AXM-1N)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +2 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) If <i>Axman</i> engages in battle with at least one slow 'Mech, <i>Axman</i> deals +1 damage to one of those slow 'Mechs.

card.name: Banshee (BNC-3E)
card.property: <i>The unpopular BNC-3E lacks adequate firepower for an assault 'Mech</i>

card.name: Banshee (BNC-5S)
card.property: Overheat 4: +3 attack <i>An XL engine makes room for heavier weapons in the BNC-5S.</i>

card.name: Battalion Support
card.property:
Put five infantry counters on Battalion Support when you activate it.
During your Deploy phase, you may pay {R} for each infantry counter you move to another site. Each infantry counter adds +1 attack to that site.
When that site is damaged, opponent may choose to redirect 1 damage to an infantry counter for each infantry counter on that site, scrapping those counters.

card.name: Bearer of McKennsy Hammer
card.property:
+1 initiative
When 'Mech piloted by Bearer of McKennsy Hammer attacks or blocks, roll a die: 1-3, no effect; 4-6, untap that 'Mech at end of current mission.

card.name: Bjorn Jorgensson
card.property: Counts as Bjorn Jorgensson while in play. {T}: One of your units has a +5 attack, only usable against targets other than Units. Use this ability only during a mission. <i>Being a warrior means killing your enemies, but equally important is knowing which of your enemies to kill.<i>|</i>Clan Ghost Bear Officer's Manual</i> • Senior Khan

card.name: Blackjack (BJ2)
Black Hawk (A Nova)
card.property: Overheat 2: +2 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes Black Hawk A deals -1 damage.)

card.name: Black Hawk (B Nova)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) If Black Hawk B attacks and is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target. <i>Configuration B features highly accurate, long-range weapons</i>

card.name: Black Hawk (D Nova)
card.property: Missile 2 Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The fire-support variant of the <i>Nova</i> is rarely used</i>

card.name: Black Hawk (Prime Nova)
card.property: Overheat 4: +6 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>This deadly Omni carries more weapons than it can effectively use</i>

card.name: Black Knight (BL6-KNT)
card.property:
Overheat 3: +3 attack
<i>The rare <i>Black Knight</i> carries a devastating array of lasers.</i>

card.name: Caesar (CES-3R)
card.property: <i>Still untested in battle, Johnston Industries' <i>Caesar</i> looks promising</i>

card.name: Candace Liao
Cataphract (CTF-3D)
Catapult (CPLT-C3)
card.property: Overheat 2: +2 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) {T}: Deal 1 damage to 'Mech or target. Use this ability only during a mission.

card.name: Caught in Hangar
card.property:
Scrap Caught in Hangar when it is revealed. You may activate Caught in Hangar during your Missions phase but not during a mission. Choose a 'Mech opponent controls. That 'Mech may be attacked, regardless of its speed.
<i>It's shooting fish in a barrel. A 'Mech's a big fish, but a hangar still feels like a pretty small barrel.|Sergeant Marty Rumble, 10th Lyran Guards, Skondia, 17 July 3049</i>

card.name: Centurion (CN9-A)
card.property:
Alpha Strike: +1 attack
<i>The <i>Centurion</i> is best known for making slow, steady advances</i>

card.name: Centurion (CN9-D)
card.property:
Alpha Strike: +2 attack
<i>The upgraded CN9-D moves quickly, thanks to an extra light engine</i>

card.name: Chaparral Missile Tank
card.property: {T}: Deal 1 structure damage to one 'Mech. Use this ability only during battle.

card.name: Charger (CGR-1A1)
card.property: <i>Kurita surpluses guarantee its use in combat despite poor performance</i>

card.name: Cicada (CDA-2A)
card.property: <i>Fast but lightly armed, the CDA-2A remains rare.</i>

card.name: Cicada (CDA-3M)
card.property: <i>Factories on Gibson have begun producing the up-gunned CDA-3M</i>

card.name: Clint (CLNT-2-3T)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The <i>Clint</i> is an efficient scout but is difficult to repair</i>

card.name: Clint (CLNT-2-3U)
Combat Engineers
card.property:
Play Combat Engineers only on a site. Site Combat Engineers enhances gets +2 attack. When that site is damaged, attacker may choose to redirect 5 of that damage to Combat Engineers, scrapping it.
You may move Combat Engineers to a different site during your Deploy phase. You may deploy Combat Engineers revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Commando (COM-2D)
card.property: <i>House Steiner is proud of this hard-hitting scout 'Mech.</i>

card.name: Communications Blackout
Communications Failure
card.property: Put a static counter on each attacking 'Mech. Each time a 'Mech with a static counter would normally untap, roll die: 1-3, 'Mech remains tapped; 4-6, untap that 'Mech and remove all static counters.

card.name: Comstar Bank Account
Contract with Gray Death Legion
card.property: {T}: One of your 'Mechs gets +3 attack and +2 armor. Use this ability only during a mission. If that 'Mech receives 5 or more damage, scrap Contract with Gray Death Legion. During your Repair/Reload phase, pay 1/2P or tap Contract with Gray Death Legion and choose an opponent. That opponent gains control of Contract with Gray Death Legion.

card.name: Contract with Wolf's Dragoons
card.property:
{T}: One of your 'Mechs gets +4 attack and +4 armor. Use this ability only during a mission. If that 'Mech receives 5 or more damage, scrap Contract with Wolf's Dragoons.
During your Repair/Reload phase, pay 1/2P or tap Contract with Wolf's Dragoons and choose an opponent. That opponent gains control of Contract with Wolf's Dragoons.

card.name: Coventry Metal Works
Critical Hit
card.property:
Play only during battle.
Choose one of your 'Mechs. Roll a die: 1-5, return Critical Hit to your hand after mission; 6, your 'Mech gets +6 attack.

card.name: Crockett (CRK-5003-1)
Culling
card.property:
Scrap Culling when it is revealed and remove it from the game.
Restock the top card from your Scrapheap for each 3 construction above the cost of Culling.

card.property: Missile 1 Anti-missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes Dasher C deals -1 damage) If <i>Dasher</i> C is fully constructed when you reveal it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region.

card.name: Dasher D (Firemoth)

card.name: Death From Above
card.property: Choose one of your 'Mechs with Jump. Roll a die: 1, that 'Mech receives 1 damage and return Death From Above to your hand after mission; 2-6, roll one die. If your 'Mech is 60 tons or more, roll an additional die. Your 'Mech and an engaged 'Mech opponent controls each receive that much damage.

card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Anti-missile Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes Exterminator deals -1 damage. <i>The Star League <i>Exterminator</i> was designed to destroy enemy command units.</i>

card.property:

card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The recovery of endo steel technology resurrected the Star League ''Guillotine'</i>

card.name: Head Shot
card.property: Choose an engaged 'Mech opponent controls. Until end of mission, for each structure damage dealt to that 'Mech, roll a die: 1-2, prevent the damage; 3-5, no effect; 6, that 'Mech is scrapped. If you don't roll at least one 6, return Head Shot to your hand after mission.

card.name: Heavy Fog
card.property: Attacking 'Mechs each get -2 attack and receive 2 less damage.

card.name: Heavy Industry

Inexorable Advance
Infantry Platoon

card.name: Inside Job

Scrap Inside Job when it is revealed. Choose one of your 'Mechs. If that 'Mech attacks alone, it cannot be blocked this turn.

card.name: ISF Counterespionage

card.property: <i>This "utterly mad" 'Mech is infamous among Inner Sphere forces.</i>

card.name: Loki Prime (Hellbringer)
card.property: Overheat 5: +6 attack Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes <i>Loki</i> Prime deals -1 damage.) ECM (Each 'Mech in a group that includes at least one 'Mech with ECM gets +1 armor.) AP (Loki Prime deals +1 damage to any target other than a 'Mech.)

card.name: Long Range Targeting System
card.property:
Play Long Range Targeting System only on a 'Mech. That 'Mech may deal up to one-half its non-missile damage (rounded down) to the target it is attacking, even if that 'Mech is blocked.
You may deploy Long Range Targeting System revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Long Tom Battery
card.property: {T}: Deal 3 damage to one site. Use this ability only during your Missions phase but not during a mission.

card.name: Luck of the Fox
Lured into Bog
Mad Cat A (Timber Wolf)
card.property:
Overheat 1: +1 attack
<i>Ample firepower and heat sinks make this 'Mech particulary dangerous.</i>

card.name: Mad Cat B (Timber Wolf)
card.property: <i>Less common than other variants, it still packs a punch.</i>

card.name: Mad Cat C (Timber Wolf)
card.property: Overheat 2: +3 attack Missile 1 Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes Mad Cat C deals -1 damage.)

card.name: Mad Cat D (Timber Wolf)
card.property:
Overheat 4: +4 attack
<i>Its many weapons allow it to fight in the enemy's midst.</i>

card.name: Mad Cat Prime (Timber Wolf)
Maneuvering Ace
card.property: Pilot: +1 initiative 'Mech piloted by Maneuvering Ace may attack and block as if one speed faster. If 'Mech piloted by Maneuvering Ace is a fast 'Mech, it cannot be blocked except by 'Mechs guarding the target.

card.name: Manipulation of Romano
card.property: Scrap Manipulation of Romano when it is revealed. Tap all guarding 'Mechs.

card.property:
Overheat 4: +5 attack

card.property: <i>Though not as powerful as other configurations it is still dangerous.</i>

card.property:
Alpha Strike: +3 attack
<i>Bristling lasers and a massive AC make this a fearsome 'Mech.</i>

card.name: Man O' War Prime (Gargoyle)
card.property: <i>This assault 'Mech's exceptional speed makes it an unpredictable foe.</i>

card.name: Marik Arms Trade
card.property: {T}: {R} {T}: Marik Arms Trade deals 1 damage to attacking 'Mech. Use this ability only during a mission. Munitions (If you have Munitions in play and you roll a 3 on a missile volley, that missile volley deals 3 damage.)

card.name: Marissa Morgan
card.property: {T}: +1 initiative and choose one of your 'Mechs. Prevent up to 2 damage to that 'Mech. Use this ability only during a mission. • Commander, Fusiliers of Oriente

card.name: Masakari A (Warhawk)
card.property: <i>A diversity of weapons allow this 'Mech to perform varied roles.</i>

card.name: Masakari B (Warhawk)
card.property: NARC (You may subtract 1 from each of your missile rolls if the missiles are assigned by a 'Mech in a group that includes at least one NARC 'Mech.) <i>The Masakari B is known for its threatening silhouette</i>

card.name: Masakari C (Warhawk)
card.property:
Overheat 1: +1 attack
<i>Many MechWarriors consider this OmniMech the ultimate fighting machine</i>

card.name: Masakari Prime (Warhawk)
card.property:
Overheat 4: +3 attack
<i>With its enhanced targeting, this 'Mech boasts unmatched long-range firepower.</i>

card.name: MASC
card.property:
Play MASC (Myomer Acceleration Signal Circuitry) only on a 'Mech.
-1 attack: Prevent up to 2 damage. Use this ability only during a mission.
You may deploy MASC revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Maskirovka Operatives
card.property: Scrap Maskirovka Operatives when it is revealed unless you reveal it during your Deploy phase. {T}: Tap a 'Mech opponent controls. Use this ability only during your Missions phase but not during a mission.

card.name: Master Spy
card.property: {R}, {T}: Search your Stockpile and retrieve a card of your choice instead of drawing a card. Any other player may ask to see this card. If that card is revealed in this way and it is a Subterfuge card, that player scraps two cards from his or her Stockpile. If it is not a Subterfuge card, scrap the card and five additional cards from your Stockpile. Shuffle your Stockpile afterwards. Use this ability only during your Draw phase.

card.name: Mauler (MAL-1R)
Maverick Mechjock
card.property: Pilot: +1 initiative, +2 attack 'Mech piloted by Maverick Mechjock cannot attack or block in a group.

card.name: Melissa Steiner Davion
card.property: {T}: Scrap a card from your hand to return one card from your Scrapheap to your hand. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. • Archon of the Lyran Commonwealth

card.name: Mercury (MCY-97)
card.property: <i>Clan technicians used the <i>Mercury</i> as the basis of the OmniMech.</i>

card.name: Mislabeled Drop Boxes
card.property:
Scrap Mislabeled Drop Boxes when it is revealed. Reveal the top card from a player's Stockpile until the next 'Mech is revealed. Replace one of that player's cards under construction with that 'Mech. Replaced card and all other cards revealed in this way are shuffled into that player's Stockpile.
You may deploy Mislabled Drop Boxes revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Misrouted Command
card.property: Scrap Misrouted Command when it is revealed. Tap one 'Mech and put three diversion counters on it. If there are any diversion counters on that 'Mech, that 'Mech does not untap. Instead, remove a diversion counter any time that 'Mech would normally untap.

card.name: Missile Spotter
card.property: You may subtract 1 from any of your missile die rolls until end of mission. Use this ability immediately after rolling the die roll.

card.name: Mobile HQ
card.property: {T}: {R} Mobile HQ cannot be attacked by slow 'Mechs. Tactics (If you have Tactics in play, add +1 to your initiative.)

card.name: Mongoose (MON-66)
card.property: <i>This quick, agile BattleMech is popular with light 'Mech pilots.</i>

card.name: Morgan Hasek Davion
card.property: {T}: +1 initiative and each attacking 'Mech gets +1 attack. Use this ability only during a mission. • Marshall of the Armies, Federated Commonwealth

card.name: Morgan Kell
card.property: Pilot: +2 initiative If 'Mech piloted by Morgan Kell attacks alone, it cannot be blocked and at end of mission put Morgan Kell into your hand. • Retired Commander, Kell Hounds

card.name: Move to Partial Cover
card.property: Choose one of your 'Mechs. Prevent up to 2 damage to that 'Mech.

card.name: NAIS
card.property: {T}: {R} {T}: Add +1 to one of your die rolls. Use this ability immediately after rolling the die roll. Tactics (If you have Tactics in play, add +1 to your initiative.)

card.name: Natasha Kerensky
card.property: Pilot: +3 initiative, +3 attack If 'Mech piloted by Natasha Kerensky is scrapped, roll a die: 1-4, no effect; 5-6, return Natasha Kerensky to your hand. </i>'• Commander Alpha Galaxy

card.name: Navigation Computer
card.property:
Play Navigation Computer only on a 'Mech. That 'Mech cannot be blocked by patrolling 'Mechs that are the same speed.
You may deploy Navigation Computer revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Open Supply Lines
card.property:
Put three operation counters on Open Supply Lines when you activate it.
Remove an operation counter at the beginning of your turn. When the last operation counter has been removed, scrap Open Supply Lines and draw an additional card at the beginning of your Draw phase until end of game.

card.name: Operation Advisory Council
card.property: {R}{R}, {T}: Gain as many resources as you have different assets in play.

card.name: Orion (ON1-K)
card.property:
Alpha Strike: +2 attack
<i>Created as the "ultimate 'Mech", it has since been overshadowed.</i>

card.name: Orion (ON1-M)
card.property: Missile 1 NARC (You may subtract 1 from each of your missile rolls if the missiles are assigned by a 'Mech in a group that includes at least one NARC 'Mech.) <i>Aleksandr Kerensky piloted an ON1-M.</i>

card.name: Overwhelm
card.property:
Choose an engaged 'Mech opponent controls. All of your 'Mechs deal damage only to that 'Mech. Each of your 'Mechs gets +2 attack.
<i>The old ways of war are dead, Father, and we must adopt, or die".|Kanrei Theodore Kurita, Luthien, 26 Dec 3051</i>

card.name: Panther (PNT-9R)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The <i>Panthers</i> heavy armament it a fovorite of Kurita MechWarriors.</i>

card.name: Perimeter Alarm
card.property:
Play Perimeter Alarm only on a site. Patrolling 'Mechs may block attacks against the site Perimeter Alarm enhances, regardless of their speed. You may deploy Perimeter Alarm revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.
<i>Sure those sensors helped. We had lots of warning before they creamed us!|Hauptmann Galen Cox, 12th Donegal Guards, Trell I, 17 Apr 3050</i>

card.name: Phantom Signal
card.property:
{T}: Roll a die: 1-2, current attack is redirected to Phantom Signal; 3-6, no effect. Use this ability only before assigning blockers.
<i>Our blip should show up on their radar any minute now, sir.|Unidentified intercepted transmission</i>

card.name: Phelan
card.property: {T} +1 initiative. Use this ability only during a mission. {T}: Restock a card you have just drawn and draw another card. Use this ability only during your Draw phase. Scrap Phelan from play to restock three cards, in any order, from the top of your Scrapheap. • Bondsman

card.name: Point Defense System
card.property:
Play Point Defense System only on a site. Point Defense Systems prevents all missile damage to that site. When that site is damaged, attacker may choose to redirect 4 of that damage to Point Defense System, scrapping it. Point Defense System cannot be attacked.
You may deploy Point Defense System revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Pryde's Pride
card.property: Choose a 'Mech. Until end of mission, if that 'Mech is scrapped, roll a die: 1, no effect; 2, draw a card after mission; 3-6, each 'Mech that dealt damage to that 'Mech receives 2 structure damage.

card.name: Puma A (Adder)
card.property:
Missile 3

card.property: Missile 2 NARC (You may subtract 1 from each of your missile rolls if the missiles are assigned by a 'Mech in a group that includes at least one NARC 'Mech.) <i>With missiles, this 'Mech can muster a withering fusillade.</i>

card.name: Puma Prime (Adder)
Pushing the Envelope
card.property: One of your 'Mechs gets +3 attack and receives 3 damage.

card.name: Quickdraw (QKD-4G)
Quickdraw (QKD-5M)

card.name: Rampage!
card.property:
Play only if unblocked.

Raven (RVN-3L)
card.property: NARC (You may subtract 1 from each of your missile rolls if the missiles are assigned by a 'Mech in a group that includes at least one NARC ECM (Each 'Mech in a group that includes at least one 'Mech with ECM gets +1 armor.)

card.name: Reassigned Pilot
card.property: Roll a die: 1-3, reassign a pilot from one of your untapped 'Mechs to another one of your 'Mechs; 4-6, reassign a pilot from one of your untapped 'Mechs to another one of your 'Mechs and return Reassigned Pilot to your hand after mission.

card.name: Report from the Watch
card.property: Scrap Report from the Watch when it is revealed. Look at the top five cards of any Stockpile. Either return those cards in any order or shuffle those cards into that Stockpile.

card.name: Retrieve Lost 'Mech
card.property:
Put three operation counters on Retrieve Lost 'Mech when you activate it. Remove an operation counter at the beginning of your turn.
When the last operation counter has been removed, scrap Retrieve Lost 'Mech and return a 'Mech from your Scrapheap to play under your control with damage counters equal to one less than that 'Mech's structure.

card.name: Retrofitted Laser System
card.property:
Play Retrofitted Laser System only on a 'Mech with a base attack of at least 1. That 'Mech has -1 attack and Overheat 2: +3 attack.
You may deploy Retrofitted Laser System revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Retrofitted Missile Rack
card.property:
Play Retrofitted Missile Rack only on a 'Mech with a base attack of at least 1. That 'Mech has -1 attack and Missile 2.
You may deploy Retrofitted Missile Rack revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Romano Liao
card.property: {T}: Reveal the top card of opponent's Stockpile. If that card is a Resource, your opponent deploys it immediately. If it is not a Resource card, scrap it. Use this ability only during your Missions phase but not during a mission. • Chancellor of the Capellan Confederation

card.name: Rookie Pilot
card.property: Pilot: -3 attack. Play Rookie Pilot only on a 'Mech opponent controls that does not currently have a pilot. Rookie Pilot cannot be reassigned.

card.name: Running Battle
card.property:
Play only during battle.
For each slow 'Mech, roll a die: 1-3, no effect; 4-6, that slow 'Mech neither deals nor receives damage.

card.name: Ryoken A (Storm Crow)
Ryoken D (Storm Crow)
card.property: Missile 3 NARC (You may subtract 1 from each of your missile rolls if the missiles are assigned by a 'Mech in a group that includes at least one NARC 'Mech.) <i>Speed fire power support make this 'Mech quite versatile.</i>

card.name: Ryoken Prime (Storm Crow)
card.property: <i>Smoke Jaguar MechWarriors value the <i>Ryoken</i> for its speed and firepower.</i>

card.name: Sabotaged Heat Sinks
card.property: Scrap Sabotaged Heat Sinks when it is revealed. You may activate Sabotaged Heat Sinks when a 'Mech overheats. Deal triple Overheat damage to that 'Mech. Draw a card when you reveal Sabotaged Heat Sinks.

card.name: Sabotaged Missiles
card.property: Scrap Sabotaged Missiles when it is revealed. You may activate Sabotaged Missiles when a 'Mech assigns missiles. Those missiles deal double damage to that 'Mech instead of dealing damage to their target. Draw a card when you reveal Sabotaged Missiles.

card.name: Sabotage 'Mech
card.property: Scrap Sabotage 'Mech when it is revealed. Deal 1 damage to one 'Mech for each 2 construction above the cost of Sabotage.

card.name: Sacrifice for the Dragon!
card.property: Choose one of your 'Mechs. Roll a die: 1-2, draw a card after mission; 3-5, that 'Mech gets +2 attack and receives 1 damage; 6, that 'Mech gets +6 attack and receives 2 damage.

card.name: SAFE Report
card.property: Scrap SAFE Report when it is revealed. Look at opponent's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Salvage Strike Crew
card.property: Scrap Salvage Strike Crew when it is revealed. Return a card from your Scrapheap to your hand.

card.name: Satchel Charges
card.property:
Play only when unblocked.
Choose an attacking 'Mech. Roll a die: 1-2, draw a card after mission; 3-6, that 'Mech gets +2 attack for each card you scrap from your hand. You cannot scrap more than three cards in this way.

card.name: Saturation Bombing
card.property: Scrap Saturation Bombing when it is revealed. Deal 1 damage to one site for each 2 construction above the cost of Saturation Bombing.

card.name: Scrounger Crew
card.property: {T}: Scrap a card from your Stockpile to gain {R}{R}.

card.name: Sentinel (STN-3M)
card.property: <i>The <i>Sentinel</i> was designed specifically to support infantry.</i>

card.name: Shady Business
card.property:
Scrap Shady Business when it is revealed.
Hide up to nine counters. If opponent guesses how many counters you have hidden, scrap that many cards from your Stockpile. Otherwise, opponent scraps that many cards from his or her Stockpile.
Scrap a card from your Stockpile at the beginning of each of your turns until end of game.

card.name: Shogun (SHG-2F)
card.property: Missile 1 Overheat 3: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>This extremly rare BattleMech is found only with Wolf's Dragoons.</i>

card.property: Pilot +1 initiative Roll a die: 1-3, 'Mech piloted by Silver Sunburst Pilot gets +(1-3) attack; 4-6, no effect. Use this ability only during a mission.

card.name: Specialized Project Team
Special Forces Op
card.property: Roll a die: 1-3, draw a card after mission; 4-6, triple all damage dealt to a card under construction.

card.name: Spider (SDR-5V)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) You may deploy <i>Spider</i> revealed to make an additional deployment this turn. <i>A triumph of 'Mech design, the Spider boast unmatched maneuverability.</i>

card.name: Stalker (STK-3F)
Stalker (STK-5M)
card.property: Missile 1 Overheat 1: +1 attack NARC (You may subtract 1 from each of your missile rolls if the missiles are assigned by a 'Mech in a group that includes at least one NARC 'Mech.)

card.name: Steal 'Mech
card.property: Scrap Steal 'Mech when it is revealed. Choose a 'Mech opponent controls. You and that opponent each hide a number of counters. Reveal those counters. If you reveal more counters, you gain control of that 'Mech and scrap cards from your Stockpile equal to twice your number of counters. If your opponent has more counters, opponent scraps cards from his or her Stockpile equal to his or her number of counters and controls that 'Mech.

card.name: Strength of the Pillar of Steel
card.property:
Play only when blocking.
+1 initiative
Prevent 1 damage to each blocking 'Mech.
<i>The proper business of the warrior is death. His only concern must be to destroy the enemy, or else to die fighting.<i>|Dictum Honorium </i>Volume II, On Proper Behavior of the Warrior</i>

card.name: Studied Move
card.property:
Return a Mission card from your Scrapheap to your hand.
<i>You can turn any battle into a chess game. Just move the pieces the right way and you'll win.|Captain Valten Ryder, 1st Somerset Strikers</i>

card.name: Subhash Indrahar
card.property: {T}: You may claim a card you have just drawn is a Subterfuge card and draw an additional card. If opponent challenges this claim, reveal the first card. If that card is a Subterfuge card, opponent scraps five cards from his or her Stockpile. If it is not a Subterfuge card, you scrap both drawn cards. Use this ability only during your Draw phase. • Director, Internal Security Force

card.property: Scrap Teachings of the Unfinished Book when it is revealed. +2 initiative until beginning of your next turn.

Play only during battle.
Roll a die: 1, your 'Mechs deal no damage and draw a card after mission; 2-6, all 'Mechs deal no damage.
